alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 7:32PM EDT until July 02 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Queen Anne`s County in northeastern Maryland... Southern Kent County in northeastern Maryland... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 732 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rock Hall, or 10 miles east of Millers Island, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Centerville, Chestertown, Centreville, Rock Hall, Church Hill, Millington, Old Town, Starr, Langford, Overton, Starkey Corner, Morgnec, Crumpton, Carville, Hope, Queenstown and Kingstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
